channel.title: King - Decide Fate wasted
channel.description:
#### What happened? Using Decide Fate without selecting execute/pardon before WASTES it completely.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Decide Fate should not be active? Or there should be a tooltip, that you have to select execute/pardon first?
#### Steps to reproduce: Any game with King.
#### Comments:

item.title: King - Decide Fate wasted
item.dc:creator: Scoundrella
item.description:
Can confirm. Had this happen in a game last night but I thought I had just done it wrong as I hadnt used the ability before.

Read full topic

item.title: King - Decide Fate wasted
item.dc:creator: WillyCoyote
item.description:
What happened?

Using Decide Fate without selecting execute/pardon before WASTES it completely.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Decide Fate should not be active? Or there should be a tooltip, that you have to select execute/pardon first?

Steps to reproduce:

Any game with King.

Comments:

Read full topic
